name: All You Can Eat (itch) (jinxedbyte)
description:
Contribution to Trijam 146 - Fast food, fast dude

Try to eat and drink as many calories as possible within 30 seconds.

Gameplay:

  • Click on the fast food icons (Cola, Burger or Fries) on the left side of the screen
  • The food will then be transported over the conveyor belt until they eventually reach the hungry and fast dude
  • The food will increase or decrease the hunger and thirst level
  • You can find the dude's hunger and thirst level right next to him
  • Try to keep the hunger and thirst in range while letting him consume as many calories as possible
  • If hunger or thirst get too high or drop too low, the poor dude will die instantly and you won't get any score

Please let us know your high score in the comments.

Collaborators:

  • Skitted: Art, Gameplay
  • Jinxed Byte: Development

Assets:

  • All art assets are own creations
  • Font : "Aha Wow" by wepfont -  https://www.fontspace.com/a-aha-wow-font-f45182
  • Background Music: Rock Theme #1 (Looped)
  • Sound: "Interface & Item Sounds" by estudiocafofo
  • Sound: "Burp.wav" by deleted_user_2104797 / freesound.org
  • Sound: "Load Burp" by AquaChannel / freeound.org
